text: Egil Henrik Bjerklund (born September 5, 1933) is a Norwegian ice hockey player. He played for the Norwegian national ice hockey team, and participated at the Winter Olympics in 1952 and in 1964. He was awarded Gullpucken as best Norwegian ice hockey player in 1961. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Ice hockey players at the 1952 Winter Olympics Category:Ice hockey players at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:Norway men's national ice hockey team coaches Category:Norwegian ice hockey defencemen Category:Norwegian ice hockey left wingers Category:Olympic ice hockey players of Norway Category:Sportspeople from Oslo
title: Egil Bjerklund
